feature1.explanation: Both texts use hyphens and commas to separate clauses and provide additional information, showing consistency in punctuation style.

feature2.explanation: Both texts use technical language related to military equipment and trade, indicating a similarity in lexical and grammatical features.

feature3.explanation: Both texts contain clear and concise sentences with a focus on conveying information logically, suggesting coherence and cohesion in sentence structure and quantitative features.

feature4.explanation: Both texts maintain a formal and informative tone, discussing military equipment and trade without emotional or narrative embellishments.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were observed in either text, demonstrating consistency in this aspect.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistent punctuation style, technical language use, coherent sentence structure, formal tone, and absence of spelling errors, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is moderately high.
